circumstances: Shortly after liftoff, while in initial climb, the engine number one failed. The pilot tried to maintain a control of the aircraft in order to avoid buildings ahead but once the altitude of 300 feet was reached, the aircraft banked left, stalled and crashed in a huge explosion. All five crew members were killed.
probable_cause: Failure of the engine number one caused by the failure of the eight spark plug's cap that were not from origin.
